text.__SUMMARY__: Cladonia parasitica, commonly known as the fence-rail cladonia or parasite club lichen, is a species of lichen in the genus Cladonia.
text.References:
Hoffm., Deutschl. Fl., Zweiter Theil (Erlangen): 127 (1796)
